Ephemeral Collections

Source: R/ephemeral.R
EphemeralCollection.Rd

Ephemeral version of SOMACollections; ephemeral collections are equivalent to SOMA collections but are stored in-memory instead of on-disk

Super classes

tiledbsoma::TileDBObject -> tiledbsoma::TileDBGroup -> tiledbsoma::SOMACollectionBase -> tiledbsoma::EphemeralCollectionBase -> EphemeralCollection

Active bindings

soma_type

The SOMA object type

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

EphemeralCollection$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
